Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any information.
Understate: The claim does not appear to understate any information.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide specific evidence or data to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that reversing restrictions on bringing back legally-hunted elephant trophies will have positive effects on conservation efforts, without providing evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider or provide alternative explanations for why the restrictions are being reversed.
